body.name: DRKIO Stainless Steel Toddler Utensils Set - 12 Pieces Kids Silverware Set Children Safe Food Grade Small Forks and Spoons Dishwasher Safe Mirror Polished
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 8 mins
features: [IDEAL TRANSITION CUTLERY] - This set of 12 includes 6 kids forks and 6 kids spoons in silver, gold, and rose gold. The delightful colors add joy to children's dining. With ample quantity, it effortlessly meets the various daily dietary needs of toddlers, kids, preschoolers, and school-age children while preventing loss. It's undoubtedly the ideal choice for transitioning to full-size utensil, making it easy for your child to embrace independent dining.

[DESIGNED FOR LITTLE HANDS] - Our ergonomically crafted handles ensure a cozy grip for tiny fingers. With smooth edges, a mirror-polished finish, short, rounded tines, and a perfectly sized spoon, these utensils effortlessly guide food to the mouth. Say goodbye to accidental stabs, ensuring a secure and comfortable self-feeding experience. Instill confidence in your child's eating journey, knowing they're equipped with the best tools for the job.

[SAFER & CONVENIENCE DINING] - Crafted from 100% premium 18/0 stainless steel, these utensils ensure your child's safety with non-toxic, rust-free materials. The sturdy and enduring design ensures these cutlery grow alongside your child. Enjoy effortless cleaning with these dishwasher-safe silverware, allowing you more quality moments with your little one, as cleanup becomes a breeze.

[ENGAGING MEALTIMES & GIFT OF JOY] - Embossed with adorable animal motifs, our kids silverware set make every meal an adventure. Your child will be excited to dine with a kitten on the spoon and a pup on the fork, turning mealtime into a fun and engaging experience. The outer box, adorned with cute cartoon patterns, makes it a delightful choice for baby showers, birthdays, or Christmas—a gift that brings smiles to both parents and children.

[100% SATISFACTION WITH NO WORRIES] - Rely on a utensils set that prioritizes your child's well-being and safety. Invest in enduring quality that grows with your child. If you receive unsatisfactory kids silverware set, please feel free to contact us and we will provide you with a 100% satisfactory solution within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The perfect size and cute handle pattern are ideal choice for kids transitioning to full-size cutlery. The delightful cartoon packaging, it not only brings joy to kids but also makes an excellent gift choice, especially for new parents.

Tailored for Little Hands Crafted with the perfect 'small size' our silverware ensures a comfortable and lightweight grip for little hands. The handles feature cute animal patterns, making every meal a delightful experience! Safer Design for Kids These utensils feature short, rounded tines, smooth edges, and a mirror-polished surface, allowing kids to effortlessly and safely guide food into their mouths, saying goodbye to accidental injuries. More Reliable Quality Made from 100% premium 18/0 stainless steel, these utensil prioritize your child's safety with non-toxic, rust-free materials. Robust and durable quality ensures these cutlery grow with your child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better in person
reviews.reviewText: Daughter loves them. They look better in person than they do online.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So cute! Love this set. Better than the plastic kids one that foods fall out of. Very happy with quality, look and color. Got a second set for grandmas house!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My toddler has decided she doesn’t like plastic “normal” toddler utensils. She wants some like mom and dad use so I got theses to try. She loves them and the girl works better to get food than the plastic toddler ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is a little over 20 months and can use these. They are slightly big but overall she can use them and they are very neat. Each one has a small animal image at the bottom of the handle and they are sets of different colors. They have been put through the dishwasher several times already and seem to be holding up well. I like these a lot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids silverware set.
reviews.reviewText: This is a 12 piece set of stainless steel toddler tableware. There are three different colors in this set of spoons and forks for children silver, rose and gold. That way each child can pick their favorite color and can have their very own color silverware. They seem to be made well so far they have washed up nicely I washed them by hand the first time did not put them through the dishwasher yet. I believe the little ones will have fun eating with silverware their own size not to mention it fits their little hands much better than big adult forks and spoons. As a little bonus there's a picture of a cat and/or a dog on the handle of each fork or spoon for an added cuteness effect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great set for any toddler
reviews.reviewText: Most spoons are made for babies and are narrow. These are definitely for toddlers with a wider spoon and fork. My grandkids are able to use these without help and because it is wider it holds the food on. They go in the dishwasher with all the other silverware for easy cleanup. Coming in different colors lets the kids have their own sets that no one else will use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Upon arrival, I washed them and we set the table using a set for my toddler grandson..AND my husband and myselfThey are beautiful...Silver, Gold and Rose Gold (2 sets of each).Lovely!He's had plenty practice using silicone to "stab, stab, stab"....learning how to use a fork.These are a good size for toddlers and older kids as well.Actually, I enjoyed using them to eat my meal too.A perfect ice cream spoon.They look so elegant for formal settings, yet, fine for every day use as well.Supervision and guidance needed depending on what stage the child is in using stainless steel flatware.These are good quality, food grade, 18/0 stainless steel.Affordable and giftable.We love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the kids to feel like the grownups.
reviews.reviewText: The DRKIO Stainless Steel Toddler Utensils Set is a real gem. Crafted with top-notch stainless steel, these utensils scream quality and durability. The value for money is impressive, getting a 12-piece set that's safe for kids and built to last.Functionally, they're fantastic. The small forks and spoons are perfect for little hands and mouths, encouraging self-feeding without any worries about harmful materials. The mirror-polished finish not only looks sleek but also makes cleaning a breeze; tossing them in the dishwasher is hassle-free.What stands out is the safe food-grade material, ensuring my child's safety while they learn to eat independently. These utensils have become an essential part of our mealtime routine. If you're searching for durable, safe, and easy-to-clean utensils that your little ones will love, the DRKIO Stainless Steel Toddler Utensils Set is a fantastic choice.
